description:
These lightweight carbon composite pedals take larger SPD-SL road cleats. Get excellent support and power transfer for racing to the finish line or getting to the coffee shop before it closes.

  • Stack height reduced by 0.6mm from previous version
  • Included SM-SH11 cleat provides 6 degrees of float, best for riders with knee issues and if your feet move naturally during pedal strokes
  • Optional larger SM-SH10 cleat has no float, and optional SM-SH12 cleat has 2 degrees of float for a balance of comfort and efficiency
  • Adjustable entry and release tension settings
name: Shimano Ultegra PD-R8000 SPD-SL Pedals
